Pre-Game Insights: Luka Doncic is available to play today after being listed as 'questionable' for the Dallas Mavericks' game against the Denver Nuggets on Sunday.
Doncic has appeared in all nine of the Mavericks' games this season and led the team in their recent matchup against the Phoenix Suns.
Doncic is currently averaging 28.8 points, 8.0 rebounds and 8.0 assists per game over nine games, shooting 40.7% from the field, including 34.1% from beyond the arc.
Reflecting on Luka Doncic’s career performance against the Denver Nuggets, the Slovenian star has consistently posted impressive numbers against his Western Conference rivals.
Over 18 games, Doncic has averaged 27.3 points, 8.3 rebounds and 9.7 assists per game, shooting 44.0% from the field, including 32.9% from three-point range.

Last season, Doncic faced the Nuggets three times, scoring over 30 points in each matchup. Across those three games, the star point guard averaged 36.3 points, 10.3 rebounds and 6.3 assists per game, shooting 48.0% from the field, including 50.0% from beyond the arc.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dallas Mavericks vs. Denver Nuggets game is scheduled to take place on Sunday, Nov. 10, at the Ball Arena in Denver, Colorado. The game will tip off at 8:00 p.m. EDT (5 p.m. PT).

The Mavericks vs. Nuggets game will be broadcast live on ALT (local) and KFAA (local). The live streaming of the game will be available on the NBA League Pass and Fubo TV app and website (regional restrictions may apply).
